content:
I think I'll go with Option 1. The quote from Mark Twain is really inspiring, and I love how it relates to travel and adventure. Here's my post:

"Mid-week motivation "The world is a book, and those who do not travel read only one page." Mark Twain. Where will your next adventure take you? Share with me in the comments! #photographylovers #travelphotography #wanderlust"

Now, I'm thinking of posting a photo of a beautiful sunset from my recent trip to the beach. It's a stunning shot, and I think it will really resonate with my followers. What do you think?
